Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
This class handles database access for the "appointments" table.
Author:
David Long

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    addApptStmt
    The insert statement for adding a new appointment record to the "appointments" table.
    private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment>
    allAppts
    The list of Appointment objects instantiated from all records in the "appointments" table.
    private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment>
    apptCounts
    The list of Appointment objects instantiated from records in the "appointments" table specific to months, type, and count.
    private static final String
    deleteApptStmt
    The delete statement for removing an appointment record from the "appointments" table.
    private static final String
    getAllApptsQuery
    The select join query for pulling relevant appointment info from "appointments" and "contacts" tables.
    private static final String
    getApptCountsQuery
    The select query for pulling appointment info and counts from the "appointments" table.
    private static final String
    getUserApptsQuery
    The select join query for pulling a user's relevant appointment info from "appointments" and "contacts" tables.
    static final String
    modApptStmt
    The update statement for modifying an existing appointment record in the "appointments" table.
    private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment>
    userAppts
    The list of Appointment objects instantiated from records in the "appointments" table specific to a single user.

    getApptCount()
    This method retrieves appointments by month and type currently in the database, along with their counts and instantiates a new appointment object for every record that is returned from the query.

    This method takes in a userId object as a parameter and retrieves all relevant appointment information that is connected to that user's Id currently in the database.

    • AppointmentDAO

      public AppointmentDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppts() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all relevant appointment information currently in the database and instantiates a new appointment object for every record that is returned from the query. All appointment objects are added to an observable list, the list is then returned.
      Returns:
      the list of appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors

    • getUserAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getUserAppts(Object userId) throws SQLException
      This method takes in a userId object as a parameter and retrieves all relevant appointment information that is connected to that user's Id currently in the database. It instantiates a new appointment object for every record that is returned from the query. All appointment objects are added to an observable list, the list is then returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user's Id
      Returns:
      the list of appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors

    • getApptCount

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getApptCount() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves appointments by month and type currently in the database, along with their counts and instantiates a new appointment object for every record that is returned from the query. All appointment objects are added to an observable list, the list is then returned.
      Returns:
      the list of appointment objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors

    • deleteAppt

      public static boolean deleteAppt(Appointment selectedAppt) throws SQLException
      This method removes the selected appointment from the "appointments" table. If successful, it calls the getAllAppts() method to reload updated data into the "allAppts" ObservableList and throws a "removal" alert to the GUI.
      Parameters:
      selectedAppt - the appointment to be removed
      Returns:
      "true" if customer is successfully removed, otherwise "false"
      Throws:
      SQLException - handles SQL errors
